Database¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.database.Database(component_manager)¶

Interface class describing the functions to be implemented by the actual database classes.

activate()¶
Initialisation code called when the component is about to do actual work, and which can’t happen in the constructor, e.g. because components on which it relies have not yet been registered.
active_count()¶
add_card(card)¶

category_names()¶
config()¶
count_related_cards_with_next_rep(card, next_rep)¶
Returns how many related cards with grade >= 2 are scheduled at ‘next_rep’. Note that there is no need that next_rep == card.next_rep.
